text: Wone mitufi ja vilumbigwe avyo jogwila chinhu choneche, chiwe chinhu cha mbawo ama ivalo ama igozi ama igunila ama chinhu chinji chilingutumika kwa choneche chila, chinhu acho chowa chikokomoche mbaka matinazo. Lelo kuchidita chiwe hachikokomoche, yanguganigwa kuchihovuga kwa mazi, hamba chowa chelile.
